bioconda.name: pysam
bioconda.summary: Pysam is a Python module for reading and manipulating SAM/BAM/VCF/BCF files. It's a lightweight wrapper of the htslib C-API, the same one that powers samtools, bcftools, and tabix.

biocontainers.name: pysam
biocontainers.summary: Pysam is a python module for reading and manipulating Samfiles. It is a lightweight wrapper of the samtools C-API. Pysam also includes an interface for tabix.

biotools.summary: A Python module for reading and manipulating SAM/BAM/VCF/BCF files.

bioschemas.name: pysam
bioschemas.summary: A Python module for reading and manipulating SAM/BAM/VCF/BCF files.
